user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Security
epics.summary: Implement robust user authentication with multi-factor verification
epics.description: Design and implement a secure authentication system that supports multi-factor verification to ensure only authorized users gain access to the portal. This epic includes user credential management, integration with identity providers, enforcement of password policies, and support for one-time passcodes or biometric validation. It ensures compliance with banking security protocols and protects sensitive financial information from unauthorized access.

epics.title: Responsive and User-Friendly Interface
epics.summary: Create a responsive, accessible portal usable across all devices
epics.description: Develop an intuitive, responsive interface optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. This epic focuses on user-centric layout design, accessibility compliance, and adaptive rendering for varied screen sizes. The implementation will provide consistent navigation and performance while adhering to modern web design practices to offer a seamless user experience across all devices.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Management
epics.summary: Provide a personalized dashboard displaying relevant information and services
epics.description: Develop a customized dashboard that dynamically shows account information, product eligibility, service shortcuts, and personalized offers based on the customer’s banking profile. This epic includes implementing a user profile management system, real-time data retrieval, and visual analytics for account overviews while maintaining data confidentiality.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Workflow Management
epics.summary: Implement workflows for online account opening and service modification
epics.description: Build guided, interactive workflows to support new account openings, product applications, and service modification requests. The workflows will minimize friction by providing context-sensitive forms, field validations, and minimal navigation steps. Automation and backend integration will facilitate efficient request handling and ensure accurate submission routing to relevant departments.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Enable customers to track request status in real time and receive updates
epics.description: Develop a mechanism that allows customers to view the real-time progress of their requests directly from the dashboard. This epic includes an event-driven notification system that triggers emails and portal alerts as requests advance through various stages. It ensures customer transparency and reduces dependency on manual follow-ups via instant updates.

epics.title: Document Upload and Draft Saving Functionality
epics.summary: Allow secure document upload and save applications as drafts
epics.description: Implement features allowing customers to upload required documentation securely during account or service requests. This epic also includes the ability to store incomplete applications as drafts, enabling customers to return later to complete them. Encrypted file storage, data validation, and drag-and-drop document support will improve ease of use and security.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate portal functionality with existing core banking systems
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system through secure APIs and middleware services. This epic covers synchronization of account data, validation of service requests, and real-time status updates. It ensures cohesive back-office interoperability, reduces latency issues, and maintains transaction accuracy across systems.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement RBAC for personalized user authorization
epics.description: Develop a role-based access control framework to restrict access to features and functionality based on a user’s role, profile, and authorization level. Customers, administrators, and support personnel will have segmented access to ensure data segregation and prevent unauthorized actions. This epic enhances compliance, system governance, and data security.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail Management
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Build a logging system that captures and preserves a complete history of user activities, service requests, document uploads, and workflow interactions. This functionality supports both compliance audits and customer transparency by allowing access to historical activity summaries. All records will be immutable and aligned with the bank’s data governance policies.

epics.title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Develop a separate, optimized database for the self-service portal
epics.description: Design and deploy a dedicated, high-performance portal database to handle all customer interactions independently from the core banking database. This will improve portal responsiveness, maintain data reliability, and provide scalability during high-traffic periods. Database caching, indexing, partitioning, and health monitoring will be implemented to ensure consistent uptime.

epics.title: Comprehensive Data Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Protect user data and ensure regulatory compliance
epics.description: Implement advanced security protocols, including data encryption in transit and at rest, intrusion detection, token-based API access, and threat monitoring. This epic will focus on compliance with financial and privacy regulations, such as GDPR and PCI-DSS. Regular security assessments and governance policies will ensure continuous data protection.

user_stories.title: Implement secure user authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a secure authentication system, so that my account is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must include secure password management, SMS/email/OTP verification, and account recovery processes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system supports secure password management.
2. The system supports multi-factor authentication.
3. The system supports secure account recovery processes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they attempt to log in, then they should be able to authenticate using password and OTP verification.

user_stories.title: Ensure session security and data encryption
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want session security and encryption of sensitive data, so that user information is kept secure and compliant with banking standards.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure session security and encryption of sensitive data to comply with banking security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User sessions are secure.
2. Sensitive data is encrypted.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user session, when the user logs in, then the session should be secured and data should be encrypted.

user_stories.title: Design a responsive and modern user interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive and modern interface, so that I can have a seamless experience across different devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The interface should align with brand standards, provide clear navigation, and ensure accessibility for users with disabilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface should adjust to different screen sizes.
2. The interface should maintain usability and accessibility.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when accessing the portal on any device, then the interface should be responsive and accessible.

user_stories.title: Develop a personalized dashboard showing relevant information
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant banking products and account details.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should display personalized banking products, offers, and account details based on the user’s profile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard shows personalized information.
2. The dashboard allows users to update personal information and manage preferences.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they log into the portal, then their personalized dashboard should display relevant information.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Implement low-step workflows for account opening
user_stories.description: As a user, I want guided workflows for account opening, so that I can easily request new accounts and apply for products.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should support saving incomplete applications, resuming later, and ensure data validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can request account openings and product applications.
2. Users can save and resume applications.
3. Mandatory fields are validated.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they start an application, then they should be able to complete, save, or resume it with validated data.

user_stories.title: Enable real-time request tracking and notifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to track my requests in real-time, so that I can stay updated on the status of my applications.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must include request tracking, email notifications, in-portal alerts, and clear message templates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can track request status in real-time.
2. Users receive notifications and alerts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they submit a request, then they should receive real-time status updates and notifications.

user_stories.title: Maintain a comprehensive activity log
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want an activity log, so that I can review user interactions and ensure compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The log should record all user interactions and transactions with compliance to data retention and security policies.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: Activity Log, Audit Trail, User, Transaction
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The system records all user interactions.
2. The audit trail is accessible and compliant with policies.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an administrator, when they access the activity log, then it should show a comprehensive and compliant history.

user_stories.title: Integrate the portal with core banking systems securely
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want the portal to be integrated with core banking systems, so that data flow is synchronized.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate using secure APIs or middleware with mechanisms for handling exceptions and ensuring data synchronization.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal integrates securely with core banking systems.
2. Data flow is synchronized, and exceptions are handled.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal, when it integrates with the core banking system, then data should be synchronized securely and reliably.

user_stories.title: Develop role-based access control mechanisms
user_stories.description: As a compliance manager, I want role-based access control, so that users access only relevant services according to their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Configure access control with privileges for different roles and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users access services based on roles.
2. Access control complies with regulations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user role, when accessing services, then they should be restricted or allowed based on their assigned role.

user_stories.title: Ensure portal performance and reliability
user_stories.description: As an operations manager, I want the portal to be optimized for performance, so that it remains reliable under high load.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement monitoring tools, optimize database queries, conduct load testing, and set up alert systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal performs efficiently under high load.
2. Monitoring tools and alert systems are in place.
user_stories.test_cases: Given high user load, when accessing the portal, then it should perform reliably with effective monitoring.

It includes frontend services for hosting web applications, backend services for handling business logic, data storage, integration services for managing workflows and messaging, and security and monitoring services.
